TextStringDefinition.TextString:
Congratulations!
WickedWhims {0.String} has been installed!

If this is not your first time, some data has been set to default. No worries, this is a standard procedure.

Everything should be working without any problems.

Failed to load parts of WickedWhims save data!

Default data was used instead.

Saving the game should override incorrect data and fix the issue.
Removing 'WickedWhimsMod' folder from 'saves' folder can help too.

An error has occurred!
An exception file (lastException.txt) has been created!

Take a deep breath, create a new save, and exit the game.

The most common reason for errors like these are outdated/broken mods.
Consider reviewing your 'Mods' folder and updating/removing old mods.
THIS IS NOT CAUSED BY WICKEDWHIMS. WICKEDWHIMS IS THE MOD THAT INFORMS YOU ABOUT OTHER BROKEN MODS.

Exception files location: {0.String}

This message is brought to you by TURBODRIVER.
You can find more information at:
lastexception.com

An error related to WickedWhims has occurred! A report file (WickedWhims_Exception.txt) has been created! If you're using any mods that require WickedWhims to work, check if they are up-to-date with WickedWhims and with the game. Exception file location: {0.String} Go to wickedwhimsmod.com/exception to learn how to report this error.

Hey! Looks like some kind of error has occurred. If it looks like it's related to WickedWhims, try using the command below. ww.fix To use a command, open the Command Console by pressing 'CTRL+SHIFT+C' on your keyboard. Then type in the command.

WickedWhims Censorship (Streamer Mode) is now active!

If correctly installed, censorship covers:
 • In-game native and WickedWhims nudity is censored.
 • CAS nudity is censored, with exception to non-WickedWhims content.
 • Sex interactions are censored.
 • Sims thumbnails and previews include censorship overlays.

Beware that any additional inappropriate content outside of WickedWhims scope cannot be accurately detected and censored.
Other modded means of displaying Sims nudity that do not occur through WickedWhims actions might not be censored.
Make sure to verify any other means of Sims potential inappropriate behavior. It's your responsibility to be aware of it.

You've installed the Non-Legacy version of WickedWhims, but your game is the Legacy Edition (32-bit).
Using the Non-Legacy version of WickedWhims in a Legacy Edition (32-bit) game will result in issues and errors.

Please uninstall this version of WickedWhims and download the Legacy version of WickedWhims.
Visit wickedwhimsmod.com/legacy

You've installed the Legacy version of WickedWhims, but your game isn't the Legacy Edition.
Using the Legacy version of WickedWhims in a regular game will result in issues and errors.

Please uninstall this version of WickedWhims and download a Non-Legacy version of WickedWhims.

FATAL ERROR!

WickedWhims and WonderfulWhims have been installed at the same time!

Only one of these mods can be present at one time!

Remove WonderfulWhims to resolve this issue!

FATAL ERROR!

Essential 'TURBODRIVER_WickedWhims_Tuning.package' file is missing!

All WickedWhims files must be located in one and the same folder!

Re-installation is required for WickedWhims to work correctly!

Always keep all of the WickedWhims files in one folder!

FATAL ERROR! Essential 'TURBODRIVER_WickedWhims_Scripts.ts4script' file is missing. WickedWhims script file is missing or cannot be loaded! Never place script files (TS4SCRIPT) into too many folders! The game fails to find them! Script files can only be placed one-folder deep. Make sure Script Mods are enabled in Game Settings. Re-installation might be required for WickedWhims to work correctly!

FATAL ERROR!

More than one installation of WickedWhims has been detected!

Only one copy of WickedWhims can exist in the 'Mods' folder!

Removal of all WickedWhims files and re-installation is required for WickedWhims to work correctly!

FATAL ERROR!

Conflicting Sim Animating Rig has been detected!

Conflicting Sim Animating Rigs will cause sex animations to break visually! Expect stretched and mispositioned penises.

Removal of all Sim Animating Rig files is required for WickedWhims to work correctly!

Read More: wickedwhimsmod.com/penis-issues

FATAL ERROR!

WickedWhims didn't load sex animations properly!

The game loading process has been interrupted which caused sex animations to not load. This is most likely due to broken/outdated mods or game/mod incompatibility!

Removal of all broken/outdated mods and updating your game/mod should resolve this issue!

Read More: wickedwhimsmod.com/exception

Sims have Red and White skin textures? Please enable the :{0.String} setting and disable the :{1.String} setting in Graphic Options and restart the game to resolve this issue! To fix broken portrait images of Sims, delete the 'localthumbcache.package' file in The Sims 4 documents folder.
This Sims Selector Menu will incorrectly display which Sims are selected.\n\nSims that do not appear as selected, but should be selected, are actually selected, you just can't see it visually.
Do you want to visit WickedWhims website? (https://wickedwhimsmod.com/)\n\nThis will open your web browser!
Check to enable any new experimental features and implementations.\nUncheck to disable any new experimental features and implementations.
Changing the state of this setting requires restarting the game to take full effect!
Open your web browser to download WickedWhims
Control WickedWhims settings - Import, Export, Reset, Disable.
Export current settings for use in different worlds.
Enter the name of this save:
Your settings have been saved under the name '{0.String}'.\n\nThey can be loaded using the 'Import Settings' menu.
You need to export settings first to import them later!
Settings under the name {0.String} have been loaded.\n\nMake sure to save and restart the game for the loaded settings to take full effect.
You need to export settings first to delete them!
Settings under the name {0.String} have been deleted.
Reset all WickedWhims settings to the default state.\n(Doesn't affect Animations Disabler)
Do you want to reset all of the WickedWhims settings?\nThis will bring back all Nudity, Sex, and Relationship settings to their default state.

All settings have been reset.


Make sure to save and restart the game for the reset settings to take full effect.
Disable all WickedWhims settings. Turns off all features.\n(Doesn't affect Animations Disabler)
Do you want to disable all of the WickedWhims settings?\nThis will disable all Nudity, Sex, and Relationship features.

All settings have been disabled.


Make sure to save and restart the game for the disabled settings to take full effect.
Pick an attribute to take away from {0.SimFirstName}.
Do you want to give {0.SimFirstName} the {1.String} attribute?
Do you want to take away the {0.String} attribute from {1.SimFirstName}?
Pick Sims to randomize attributes on.
Pick attributes to randomize on Sims.
The total of {0.String} attributes has been added to {1.String} Sims.

{0.String} You're running WickedWhims {1.String} Loaded {2.String} animations by {3.String}. Loaded Custom Content by {4.String}. Key Development Contributions Noir and Dark Sims https://patreon.com/noiranddark Mike24 https://patreon.com/mike24 Azmodan22 https://patreon.com/azmodan22 PhaseLotA https://twitter.com/PhaseLotA wild_guy https://www.patreon.com/wild_guy ooOLaLa World https://patreon.com/ooOLaLaWorld Lupobianco https://patreon.com/lupobianco Wyatt https://wyattssims.tumblr.com Luumia https://luumiasims.com Jarl44, Denton47, autobanned, Redabyss, biondosim, and ZoahcX.
